plugins.description: Universal multi-domain agent system for Claude Code with 278 specialized agents across 12 domains. Orchestration V2 features realistic organizational hierarchy (Engineering Manager → Tech Lead → 6 Domain Leads → Individual Contributors), two-phase planning (strategic → tactical), intelligent skill-based assignment, 4 communication protocols (delegation, broadcast, handoff, standup), 10-state task lifecycle, and capacity management. Software domain (52 agents with V2) includes Engineering Manager + 6 Domain Leads (Frontend, Backend, QA, DevOps, Data, Security). 12 complete domains: software, business, creative, planning, sales, marketing, finance, operations, hr, legal, support. Features Intelligence Layer, QA Layer, Executive Leadership, and comprehensive workflow orchestration. Universal /trigger, /designer, /reviewer commands work across all domains.
